entries.femaleVariant: Ugh, it's just the constant bickering over every little thing!
That's how it is with guys. They need to think they're the ones making all the decisions.
Next meeting, listen to every single one of their suggestions. One after the other.
You know, pretend to be interested, throw 'em a little praise and say "yeah, let's do it."
Thing is, their ideas are usually shit.
Doesn't matter. You say one thing, then do it all your own way anyway. Just pretend it was their idea.
I don't get it. Won't they notice?
Honey, it's not about what anyone does, it's about how they feel. Their ego. You just gotta give it a little stroke.
